content.detailedDescription:
On june 11, 2010 at approximately 11:00 pm, my girl friend and i witnessed 25-50 star-like redish orange lights moving east to west along the caloosahatche river near downtown fort myers, florida. we were located on our balcony in our high-rise condo. the objects had no sound associated with them. duration lasted approximately 10 minutes - then they disappeared in clouds to the west. we did not know what they were but were positive that they were not conventional aircraft or helicopters due to no sound. (we often see and hear conventional aircraft on our balcony) approximately 15-20 minutes after the event, we contacted lee county sheriff's department non-emergency and reported incident and wanted to know if anyone else either saw or reported the objects. non-emergency personnel indicated that there were no other reports at that time. we also contacted our local fox new station for information and to also see if anyone else reported these objects but had to leave a message.

we attempted to get photographic evidence of the event; however, due to our balcony being screened-in, we were unable to get clear pictures of the objects. we are very curious as to what the lights were and if anyone else noticed and reported the event. in short, we would like information on the event if there are other reports.
content.summary: 25-50 star-like objects, redish orange moving east to west.

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and my sister were smoking a cigarette outside the front of our home, which is in north hertfordshire facing due north, when we noticed what looked like a plane with a newly forming vapour trail* (we couldnt actually see the object creating the trail, but presumed it was a vapour trail) being illuminated by the setting sun, though thought it looked a bit weird, and didnt think anything else of it. we continued to watch it, and the 'trail' appeared to grow in size, and shorten, and sometimes break into several pieces, get brighter and dimmer, and change shape and direction. we looked over again at it a few minutes later and realised another had appeared behind it, followed by another, and then another, totalling four objects. we also observed a bright point of light that would appear and disappear at random within the middle of the 'formation'. it was at this point that i called my girlfriend, who live in cambridge (about 30 miles north of where i was at the time), and asked her to look into the sky and see if she could confirm this for me, which she did. the sighting lasted about 20 minutes, before one by one the lights slowly dimmed and the disappeared.

*the 'trail' started off as a point of light and slowly elongated, and then proceeded to change shape regularly, from a ball of light to a longer cigar shape, to two, then three, individual balls of light. this was one of the objects, all four behaved in a similar fashion.
content.summary: 4 glowing objects with one bright light appearing at irregular intervals in between them.

content.detailedDescription:
Close to christmas in 2002 i and my 21 year old son (who was sleeping in the passenger seat) were traveling north on highway 5 in california, coming up upon the turn off to los banos going west, still @ 40 miles from it.  about 4:30 pm, still daylight.  the sun was close to setting at that time and we were behind a set of low foot hills about 100-400 feet high on the west of the freeway.  when i first spotted the discs a couple of miles ahead of me they were in the sunshine.  my mind tried to match what i was seeing with any other known outlines of flying vehicles and they did not match anything i could come up with.  i was amazed and curious as to why no one was stopping to look at them.
i spotted 2 discs hovering above the highway on the east side, very close to the road, between 500-600 ft above. after about a minute of viewing them, i realized they were flying discs,as they did not look like any other thing i could recognize.  for several miles i watched them taking turns fading in and out, continuing until i was going to drive right under them. by the time i reached them at 65 miles an hour both the roadway and the discs were in the early shade of the foot hills.  higher than that, it was still in sunlight.  there was plenty of bright daylight left to see the whole scene. when i say brightening i mean that the whole disc got slowly brighter - not a single light fixture - and then the whole disc faded to the metalic look and the other one then lit up- they did not get too bright to look at - it was like they were on a reostat and it was slowly being turned on to about halfway.  they were never really bright as if the sun was hitting them as when i first spotted them but more faded than that. i could not see that they were fading and lighting up until the shadow of the hills covered them. i awakened my son and asked if he saw them - which he did - and told him to look closely as we drove by and see if they were in any way teathered.  he had good eyesight and unequivically said no, they were not teathered.  he immediately went back to sleep and as soon as we had passed the spot i also completely forgot about them, until much later.  the only reason i remembered is because i heard someone elses story about a similar happening to her the next day after i got to my destination.  all of a sudden i realized that we had also seen that type of sighting only with 2 discs, one above the other and the lower one was slightly ahead of the other towards the road (but not directly over the road.  the two were pretty much strattling each other)  my son has never remembered the event. 
i don 't know if you want suppositions but i believe the fading in and out was sending out magnetic waves of forgetfulness so people kept right on driving instead of actually stopping along the freeway to gawk. 
  the early shadow of the foothills just highlighted the brightening and fading of the discs. not one other car on the freeway even slowed down to look at them.
content.summary: 2 discs hovering next to highway 5 -taking turns going  brighter and fading out, 1000 ft above and east of road. daylight.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving northbound on the interstate 5 with my father and girlfriend  leaving a family get together. we were still in orange county, just passing disneyland when i noticed two very bright disc shape objects in the sky. they looked like a bright pink, not as bright pink as the sky around the objects. my first thought was these two objects were perhaps clouds, although there were no clouds at all in the sky. they looked to be about 500 yards between each other, both moving east. as we drove further down the highway they had become brighter and more disc like. it was at that point when we knew they were not clouds. we were watching these disc for about 7 minutes when the disc then moved west. one disc started approaching the moon it looked and when it had just passed the moon it slowly vanished and was completely gone which blew my mind. the other disc still appeared in the sky for only about two more minute when it started approaching the moon and then vanished like the other. at certain times it looked as if it had a fire type of trail behind it. i thought maybe it could be rockets but i have seen many rockets in my life and they were not like this shape and metallic color, and i have never seen any object in the sky vanish.
content.summary: Two bright pink disc shape objects moving toward moon.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my backyard on the evening of june 13th, 2010. it was around 10:30 pm and a very clear night in portland, or. the stars had just started to come out as it gets dark later and later this time of year. it was a beautiful evening and my eyes were drawn to the sky. there is a lot of air traffic in portland with the airport and i am quite familiar with the speed and looks of airplanes at night. there was the usual air traffic here and there: slow moving planes with their lights blinking and flickering in the distance. there was a pause in air traffic and the sky was calm. i noticed a small, star-like object out of nowhere moving very fast across the sky from the south heading north. i was facing east with the big dipper directly behind me. there was no special shape to it. it was not glowing in any way. there was no tail like a shooting star or comet. there were no lights at all. it wasn't blazing across the sky but moving at a steady, faster-than-a-plane speed. it soon went out of eye-view (trees,etc.). i thought it was interesting but kind of just shrugged my shoulders. about ten minutes later i saw the same thing. again, i didn't see where it came from but it had the same flight pattern, flew fast across the sky, and disappeared from view. the object did not change direction while flying from its original path. after seeing it a second time, and eliminating all possibilities, i thought that i may be witnessing something here so i got a little more excited. my eyes were now glued to the sky in this area. around 10:30-10:45 pm is when i could officially tell myself i witnessed a ufo. looking up at the sky (se direction) i saw an extremely bright light that had the appearance of the north star only about 10 times brighter and much bigger. it was so bright i had to squint...At night! my mouthed dropped as the massive glow shrunk down to the size (like a dimming light) of the two previous "crafts." it streaked across the sky at the same speed as the others on the same flight path. this time before disappearing out of eye sight it deviated from its original northern path, started flying up into the sky and literally disappeared; not out of eye-sight, it just vanished up into the sky. i felt overwhelmed with what i had witnessed but also extremely lucky. i felt very fortunate to have just witnessed the strangest, most exciting thing ever. again, there were absolutely no lights flickering or blinking. it was not a shooting star or a comet. i know what those look like. no cigar or v-shape, etc. i am not a person that thinks any strange object in the sky is a ufo. i have never thought to having seen a ufo before nor have i reported anything like this before. my eyes will be glued to the sky in the nights ahead!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovering, large bright light in sky shrinks down to star size, flies briefly, shoots upward, disappears.

content.detailedDescription: My friends and i were walking on new dorp beach, in staten island, new york (one of the five boroughs), and we looked up to stargaze, and instead see strange lights in a clear night sky. the pattern of lights was consistent with a tail light (color purple-ish), two wing lights (a strange white color), and a center light (red to green). what was most frightening to us was the sound- or rather lack of any. the bottom was black and sleek, almost as if it were an sr-71 blackbird, although current technology does not allow for flight ascending directly upwards and downwards, and does not allow for sudden almost sonic speeds. it seemed to slow as it was above us, the lights in the front became three white headlights, and it was followed by an obviously american military jet. this craft has been spotted in many different areas on staten island. it's one thing to run a military test run, but it's completely another to see a military jet actually chasing an unknown craft. i haven't the slightest clue whether it was of a terrestrial or extraterrestrial nature, but quite frankly it's been seen quite often. it was both wonderous and frightening, we were all mesmerized. we lost sight of the craft after it sped away in a curious diagonal pattern. i apologize for lack of any photographs, we figured that if it were military, the last thing college students want is to be investigated due to photos of military craft.
content.summary: New dorp beach fly over- low enough to see the bottom of craft.

content.detailedDescription:
At about 8:00am i was traveling east on us2 just west of i75 just outside st ignace city limits. i saw what i thought was a low flying jet to my right (south). it interested me because there was no contrail. i turned left onto the service road that paralled i75 north. the object also turned and flew over i75 parallel to my car. the object matched my speed and i was able to observe that it was a cagar shaped matlic craft with a strobe light. i slowed down to get a better look at it but did not stop because i had my child with me. i looked away as i approched a curve when i looked back the craft was gone. at the time i had heard about ufo but did not know anything particular about them. i wasn't afraid but felt cautious. i called my mother and told her what i had seen. she said  don't tell anyone.
 this was the same day that the edmond fitzgearld went down in the white fish bay in lake superior. i lived on campus at lake superior state college at the time and was working in st ignace. that evening i was listening to wsoo raido and began to hear reports of the sinking of the fitz. the raido announcer was also recieving reports of a ufo sighting near new burry michigan. the announcer became very excited and began to speculate as to wheather the ufo sightings and the sinking of the fitz were related. the reason i am reporting this now is that i have searched the internet for other sightings on 11/10/75 and have not been able to find any reports for that day and area.
content.summary: Daylight metalic strobe lights.

content.detailedDescription:
This account of this event being told by someone that didn't witness this. this is just the information i was told from my brother and his gf. they are  just normal everyday people and this event really frightened and was truly amazing. i really wish i could have been in there place for this.

this event takes place two years ago. i never ask my brother if i could post this  and i haven't talked to him about it in a while so i am a bite fuzzy on some details.
 my brother, his gf and there roommate were sitting watching television in there apartment. this is at night not too sure at what time but it was dark. they noticed strange lights out side in the sky through their glass door onto there balcony. my brother being a amateur astronomer owns a telescope that sits in front of their glass door of the balcony. he is always star gazing or using it to view the sights of the town. being interested in such astronomical events he went to investigate the strage lights. too his amazement he describes seeing two small crafts flying around the city. he told me they weren't too high in the sky(300m-800m) and were flying around the city scanning the town and area.   his gf and roommate were also watching this as it was happening. 

now my brother told me that they were doing this for quite some time a few hours , this gave him plenty of time to view the small crafts through his telescope. he drew the crafts out on paper the last time i visited him just to describe it better visually.  the small crafts  diamond shaped with lights orbiting around them. he described  the lights as appearing to work like some kind of shield/aura. there movements were that of a fast  helicopter/ stunt rc copter but over the  town. moved fast and would stop scan the move on. not physically possible to do with his knowledge of aviation's is what he told me. he was viewing them through a telescope  so he got one of the best sighting a person could wish for. during this long event he noticed a large crafted in the upper atmosphere.This was disk shaped with many lights and was blocking out stars as it slowly moved across the sky. he never drew the mother ship for me but i had a long talk with him about this event a few years ago. 

my brothers emotional state  through this was fear and amazement. his gf and roommate both were horribly frightened to the point of tears and crying. the most fearful of the event was when they were viewing the smaller crafts through his telescope and the scanning beam washed over them on his balcony. he told me that he  ducked and nearly **** his pants , pardon my expression. his gf and roommate wanted him to stop watching in fear of retaliation from the crafts but he  continued anyways. he called a few of his friends that came over and also viewed this crafts through his telescope. no video footage or photos were taken from him. he just enjoyed his view from his telescope and said it was a lifetime experience. i was told the event ended when the two smaller ships flew up to the mother ship then took off  and he couldn;t find it anymore. his gf was scared during the telling of this story and didn't like talking about it. was told that everyone that watched it had a hard time sleeping and they ended up watching a few movies that night till sun came up. 

the scanning he described as a thin line that wash over and area, ships would move on then do it again from different angles.
content.summary: Watched two small ufos and mother ship in upper atmoshpere.

content.detailedDescription: It was a ordinary sunday night in el paso texas around 9:15pm and my father my brother and i were driving back home heading west.We were driving in the neighborhood area near home when my father then noticed a bright light in the sky and we all focused in on it. it was moving very rapidly through the sky way faster than any airplane or even jet could go and covered the whole sky from north to south in just a couple of seconds. as we watch it it began to get bright then dim much like pulsing i guess you could say then it began hover toward the south west area of town. as we watched trying not to lose sight of it a green beam began to beam at the bottom of it. i noticed at the bottom of it where the beam was the object appeared to be pointed more like a diamond. the object only had the beam out for about 3 seconds at the most and then just disappeared instantly. as we began to search for it it then appeared toward the west where it originally appeared. then it raced across the sky to the north where it disappeared for good. as we arrived at some stop lights we noticed a border patrol helicopter that was unlit and following the path where the object seemed to fly through. we then raced home to try and see if we could get the object on video or binoculars.Unfortunately there was no more activity in the sky but we all tried to believe what we just saw. we knew for sure it wasn't a airplane jet or helicopter or possibly some experiment from ft. bliss which is the army base here.I guess you could say this whole experience was like being in war of the worlds.
content.summary: Saw a ufo race across the sky drop tractor beam and race back across sky and dissapears.

content.detailedDescription:
Actually i have seen this thing three times over the last two weekends.

the first time it was june 11 at night around 8 pm it was on the north side of i 30 and at that time i thought it may be a huge star but i watch the skies all of the time and had never remembered seeing a star on that side that large. my friend (*name deleted,sgonzalez/cms) was riding with me and she saw it too. i brought it to her attention and she said maybe its a plane but we both noticed that it was not flashing any lights it was just a bright star like light just floating there not moving. i had never seen this before in that area and i have been in this area for a long time. i could see it between the houses once we reached my house, i had to go out about an hour later to get a blanket out of the trunk of my car and got this very eerie feeling like the hair stood up on the back of my neck and my arms and i walked all around to see if i could see the light or start and it had gone no where to be seen.

anyway the next weekend she came down and we went to the hunt county fair on saturday night and we were with my sister and her husband and dad and i noticed it hoovering over the fair there were stars out but not really bright because it had been cloudy. i pointed it out to my dad and he said well it may be a really bright light on a tall pole but it was not that because, when we left it seem to be following us or going ahead of us sort of like a star seems to move to different sides of the highway  as you drive so still did not think to much but as we traveled on back to royse city where i live it was over on the north side of 30 again and this time it did not seem to be as bright but more dim and when we got to my house i could not find it anywhere it had vanished. the next time  i saw it was on sunday night june 13 around 8 pm my daughter (**name deleted, sgonzalez/cms) had come to visit and was leaving and i walked her out to her car and looked up which i always do and it was right above the house roof next door and i pointed it out to her and told her about how it had been over the fair the night before. she left and i went in to get my binoculars and i watched it for a very long time there were air planes flying near by and i was watching to see if any acted the same way but they were normal planes with flashing green and red lights and this light is just there no flashing and yet it seemed to move from side to side very slowly. at one point it would be further to the left of the housetop roof and then move in closer to the roof although it was very far above the roof. i watched with my binoculars trying to see if i could see it clearer but i am very near sighted and far sighted too and astigmatism so with my glasses it did not appear very close but it did appear to be very bright looking through them but it has a red aurora at the bottom yet it did not flash just red light covering the lower portion of the light or start like orb. it seemed to be round in shape when looking through the binoculars... i had three of my grand children looking at it and my grand son said it looked like a star but he did see the red underneath it. one of my grand children acted like she was a bit scared so after about 20 min i took them inside the house where i told them to stay inside and went out the back of the house and the light appeared further to the back of the house next door and i thought well maybe just a star that appears to be moving but not maybe i am just viewing it from different angles. so i went inside the house where the kids were.

after bout 15 min i went back out the front and the light was gone, i then went out the back of the house and i could not see it at first and i was talking to (****name deleted, sgonzalez/cms) my friend about this on my cell and thought it had gone but then i saw it way in the distance to the south west just hanging there for about 10 min and it was  more yellow in color like the atmosphere had possibly altered the color. i went back in for about 5 or 10 min and then back out the back and it was no where to be found. it may be a satellite it could be a spy aircraft but it is not a normal craft that i have seen in this area before. just wanted to report so maybe if someone else has seen this that we may find out what it is or to see if anyone feels the same way i do about it if it has been spotted by anyone else in the area.

it seemed to go away once i was not looking at it and although it moved from side to side very very slowly so much that it seemed imaginary movements i could tell by the distance from the roof of the house that it was moving.  it is very close to my house so that it is important to find out what it may be ..

all i have is a phone camera but if i see it again i will take a picture and attach it here if possible.
content.summary: Bright light hovering over city.

content.detailedDescription:
Was a very clear night sky, what is a kind of rare in s���o paulo, and i was looking through my window to the city as a whole (i live on the 23rd floor, in downtown area and i have a wide and privileged view of the city from here) then this thing crossed the sky in an incredible speed!
i've seen meteors on the past, and i'm sure this was not a meteor or an asteroid at all... meteors behave different, because when they appear looks like thick and disappear thin, you know, but this thing was very uniform on its trajectory, and on my field of view, from the top of my window to the horizon it took less than a second. a very uniform thick risk on the sky on a tremendous velocity!
it came from the north to south.
could you guys please tell me, what was that? is there any other report about it?
thanks
content.summary: A tick bullet in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
This is an event that we (wife and i) have seen repeatedly over several years. we have wondered for some years what this could be. the object appears as a star or bright planet. the configuration seems as if it is an hour glass shape. at times it appears to have red or green light on the top or bottom. as we just witnessed the object moved in all directions with no pattern in the movement. in mentioning the red and/or green lights, for a lack of a better description, which are on the top and/or bottom of the hour glass shaped object, it makes one suspect some sort of airplane or helicopter. maybe not. we have seen this object in all seasons, not in the same position in the sky, but there none the less. being located in middle of the east coast and surrounded by numerous military bases could be part of the answer. 

**tonight we were sitting outside on the patio when i noticed the object(again). we remarked that "there goes the "bouncing star". we watched it for 15 or 20 minutes and then went inside since it is nothing new to us.We first noticed it some years ago late one night on our way home. the road is positioned exactly east west. it was in december, say 2003 or so and the object was directly west. subsequently it has been seen in warm months in the east or east southeast. being courious i decided to research it online and got only one return on a search for moving star and only one reference which lead me here. since it is summer i'll try to find the right optical equipment to record this event and update this entry in the future.
content.summary: appeared as a star atop a star moving in erratic directions.

content.detailedDescription:
I was just taking pictures of the clouds in the sunset and caught some interesting things i didn't see while taking them. i noticed them when i transferred them to my pc. i had no idea what these objects were, only that they weren't in the other sequential shots only one shot. i was really excited to finally capture something even if it wasn't my goal at the time. more people should look to the sky. 

in the first picture to the north east of the tree line theres a faint black object..? very odd it wasn't in any of the other shots i took back to back. i was trying to take sequential shots of the clouds changing and got that. i took many shots that day and the next picture is what blew my mind. you see four black spherical looking objects and once again in the next picture they were gone...?
content.summary: Sunset taking random pictures.

content.detailedDescription: Over the west horizon four bright red balls of light rose straight up in a line straight up in the sky.  they where floating up into the air almost like lanterns in the sky or like a tracer on a firework but it went up way to high to be that.  my husband notice it first when he was unloading the car.  they where so very bright.  the neighbors came out and saw it as well.  one neighbor said he saw the same thing the night prior.
content.summary: Round bright red ball.

content.detailedDescription:
About midnight, sat down on side of bed to go to bed. noticed a
yellowish light beam - such as a car turning around would project -
shined on the house. no way is that possible i thought and got up to
see.

saw a blue-white light glowing from overhead...And flashing....Like heat
lightning. could not see the sky directly due to an overhanging balcony
in the way. wondered why the "heat lightning" stayed so long in that one
place...And began watching the flashing white orbs out my window. knew they were w-a-y
too large for fireflies, i kept trying to figure out what they were as
they blinked off and on. the overhead blue-white glow was also off and
on again and still seemed like heat lightning. it had rained earlier and
would rain again, but it was not hot enough for heat lightning i
figured.

still watched the orbs and they were floating 2nd floor high - where i was. they
seemed to cover the 125-150 feet of the driveway  out in front of the
2nd floor deck...About 20 of them flashing off and on and moving about a
bit. some a bit higher but mostly right in front of me. surrounded by
woods on all sides it was very dark. wasn't sure how much cloud cover
was involved but i noticed i could see the glow of the city lights over
the mountain top.

i just could not figure it out. was a bit scared and alot confused at
what was going on. 

was wondering why my dog was not barking. then i wondered
if something had happened to him. also, thought it may have been out of his
line of sight from inside the garage.

no sound. just "heat lightning" sporadic flashes from above that corner
of the house and those moving flashing white softballs...Mostly at eye
level with some seemingly a bit higher. one actually was a little
farther out perhaps, but still close enough to be in the group.

decided to get a flashlight and go up one floor and step out onto that
balcony to see if i could see people or anything. noticed it was dark in
back side of the yard as i passed the back door. got upstairs and all i
saw was dark. nothing. 

returned, none the wiser, to the second floor where i first witnessed this, closed the
curtain and went to bed.

having recently lost a pet, for the next two days i tried to find information on pets that have
recently died passing over to the other side. i was wondering if that
was what i had witnessed, but too many lights, also too large actually to be
pet souls as research suggested. i could find nothing close to that event in searching for
information in that direction.

finally told someone after 3 days. they
found online a similar happening to mine that had been reported on a ufo site
last year.

light-bulb-moment:
having ruled out the pet transition theory, i now am searching for ufo
information.
content.summary: Flashing/floating white softball-sized orbs and blue-white lightning overhead.

content.detailedDescription:
I was with a friend unloathing some stuf in my garage, the sky was cloud free perfect suny blue sky, i'm noticing what a beautifull day it was, and then i see this white sphere going fluidly throug the sky at aprox. 1000m high. 
it didn't change course, it just whent on the same direction, but in a way a plane couldn't go, just so fluid...It did'nt whent very fast but clearly faster then a plane, i saw one in the sky at the same time that the sphere and the phere was much faster. then it desapeer behind my buiding.
i went around but it waas gone. i told my friend to look at it while i saw it but he couldn't see it because the sky was too brigh. i know what i saw, believe it or not. just wanted to share this. thank you for your time.
content.summary: Small white sphere.

content.detailedDescription:
It's had happened several times last month, that star shows up a differents height from the horizont. higher or lower, looks like it has a secundary and smaller red light hovering around.
the "star" moves up or down, disapearing and shining back again and again.
nights were clear, so no clouds made it disapear.
has anyone have any idea?
content.summary: Looks like a star but  bigger, brighter and closer than tthe others, we could see a smaller red light flying around.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work and outside taking our garbage out and i looked up to the west sky and i seen this object spinning around in the sky and it got faster and shot up through the cloud.It was a sunny day and not may clouds that day.I know it was not a plane or bird..It was weird,it was under a cloud,spinning and shot strait up above the cloud and it was gone.
content.summary: It was far up in the sky above a cloud and changed speeds and spinned around and went further up.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in back yard, facing western sky, looking at stars, fairly clear weather, scattered clouds, but good visibility, 10:30pm.  at 10:45pm, a very white bright sphere appeared to my left, in south sky, approx 45 degree angle looking up, and traveled to north. what got my attention, was the brightness, the tremendous speed it was going, no noise, in a straight line, no trail. it was under the cloud cover, as i observed it the entire time which was only approx 3 seconds to cover the distance from south to north across the entire sky. i knew it definately was not a jet, as the speed was tremendous, it was, i'd estimate at a height and size of a jet passing by, but way too fast. my thought was perhaps a satellite. any response to what you may think this was, will be appreciated. thank you. i also when i first noticed it, thought it was a falling star, or meteorite coming down, but there was no change of color, no trail, no deviation in its path.  at that speed, could only think ufo. after it passed north to my right, it just disappeared into the sky. i sat for another half hour, and observed the sky, wondering if i should contact you, and if anyone else reported such a sighting.  thank you for your time.  (* deleted wit's name, sgonzalez/cms).
content.summary: Bright white sphere. under clouds, traveling extremely fast from south to north.

content.detailedDescription: Wife and i were watching tv with the blinds open.  she noticed the two lights first and called my attention to them.  they were coming from the west towards town.  movement was steady but speed and exact course varied slightly for both lights.  they were moving together but not synchronously.  we went outside for a better view.  there was only one light cloud in the sky to the south.  the lights stopped eastward movement at a position we would describe as south of town.  the northernmost light simply hovered but the southernmost light moved slightly to the southeast.  both lights then proceeded to move south and to elevate their altitude.  the only cloud in the sky was on their course to the south.  the northernmost light entered the cloud first and was lost to sight.  the southernmost light continued for about a minute or two longer before passing through the cloud.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange lights moving west to east then south.

content.detailedDescription:
On saturday evening 6-5-10 at approx 7:30 pm i was driving north on florissant road going to the umb bank. i was driving north on florissant road through downtown ferguson, mo. i noticed an object hovering fairly high in the sky off to my north east approx 1/4 mile or so away. i pulled off the road into the parking lot where the city of ferguson holds their "farmers market" on saturdays. i stopped the car as soon as i turned into the lot. i stuck my head out the window stunned and watched this object for about a minute and then i grabbed my iphone to get a picture. i activated* the camera and went to take a picture and the camera mal-functioned. 

the object then about as fast as you can snap your fingers was gone, off  to the northeast.  i briefly turned my head and then looked back and the object was there again and even closer now. it was close enough now that i could clearly see the shape, probably about an 1/8 a mile or less away. it was dark gray in color, no lights or sounds at all. it appeared to be a stretched star with 2 points prevalent on each end looking like an introverted ���v��� and 1 small extroverted  ���v��� on each long side (6 points total ). when i got the camera going again quickly, it was in my clear view. when i snapped the picture, it was just about gone completely from my site. i am positive of what i saw, and would be more than willing to take a lie detector or be hypnotized or try any new technology that���s out there, i���m ready.  i know what i saw, i am positive of what it was. 

after  it was gone ( about 3 minutes later)  i pulled out of the parking lot and was driving north again down florissant road and went right pass the bank and then continued on until i finally came to the corner of florissant road and hereford  rd (about a 1/4 mile pass the bank). it then hit me that i was actually driving my car. i didn���t know i was driving or why i even in my car at all. i didn���t know where i was supposed to be. after about 30-45 seconds i remembered that i was going to the atm to get some money for my daughter. i turned around and continued to the bank. everything was a complete blank in my mind for a short time. i was very scared and thought that there was no way that i was the only one that could have seen this. i was totally shaken. i drove home real quick and tried to draw what i saw. my hand was shaken so bad i had to wait awhile. i couldn���t draw a straight line at all. good thing for ���paint��� programs.

again, there is no doubt what so ever of what i saw. it was an experience that i will never forget in my life time. i wasn���t to sure before if i really truly believed in this kind of thing, but i was convinced on that night. i���m not afraid any more, i want to see it again so bad.
 

* the "camera" after you select the camera icon, opens and then you must select another option before the camera will fully activate. once you do that the camera is ready to stay on forever. i had the camera fully activated and the object was clearly on the screen and as i pushed the "take picture" icon, the "option icon" that activates the camera popped up and would not let me take a picture until i pressed it again. the thing is, i already had the camera activated and that should not have come up again. it has never did that before and hasn't done it since. i have tried to make it happen and it just won't happen.

anyway, that���s my encounter experience. thank you
content.summary: Seen object hovering in mid air, pulled off road and watched in awe

content.detailedDescription: Almost every evening when it is clear these objects appear to move in a straight line but when viewed through binoculars they move erractic and have red green blue lights that when the object moves the lights are on the opposite side of motion. my wife has seen them. it started a few months ago with one object now has inceased to several. cannot tell how far away they are in the dark. i have reported these objects before here and it has gotten to be an almost every day event. i watch them until i get tired and sometime i get up through the night and look outside and they are still there. air craft in the area seem not to see these objects or even if the aircraft passing through are civilian. these things give me a creepy feeling and to tell you the truth i am afraid of them for some reason. if the appear again and no cloud cover at night i will report them again
content.summary: Bright light with colored lights in ring blurred appearance

content.detailedDescription:
We were up in eleven mile canyon, lake george, co, camping, watching the eastern sky, about 10pm mst. when there was a big flash and what we thought looked like a huge fire work. the red balls were falling, then the red balls started the flying off in different directions,(more like zip off), there were a lot of them. then there were 3 bigger lights that were moving together in a triangle formation, moving from east to west.
the other objects were much smaller with flashing red lights ziping all over the sky and up to the triangle formation. this went on for a very long time.
content.summary: We were up in eleven mile canyon, lake george, co.

content.detailedDescription:
Downtown lansing about 11:05am - walking towards kalamazoo and grand ave and saw something bright in the sky.  looked up, assuming it was a plane.  the sun was glinting off of it very strongly when i first saw it - only the "nose" wasn't shining.  it moved deliberately across the sky.  it was lower than all other planes and did not have contrails.  it made no sound.  when i got to kalamazoo i realized it didn't have wings or a fin.  the metal and shape reminded me of old 50's trailers that were all steel/aluminum/whatever.  i thought, "ufo?", but didn't really believe it.  i looked both ways, crossed to the turn lane, looked back up, and i couldn't find it.  i searched in the same area of the sky and found it - but it was barely there!  it was a clear blue sky - clouds would not show up for 2 hours - and even though this was very low, it was disappearing.  i could see the outline the clearest, the inside was now the same color as the sky.  i looked at traffic and then crossed (less than 15 feet) and when i got to the sidewalk, i couldn't find it.  it should have been directly ahead of me in the sky (looking northward) i looked in that clear sky for 5 minutes and could find it.  

no one else saw it.  downtown lansing is full of people at this time of day (state workers) and it was a warm day, so there were many people walking.  i looked around and realized that no one was looking up and that most people don't.  watch people next time you are  out - they are either looking at the ground or at eye-level.  anything could be flying overhead and, if it doesn't make noise, no one's going to see it.
content.summary: Cigar/cylinder starts bright, then becomes the color of the sky/disappears.

content.detailedDescription:
My first sighting was almost a year ago, and all have happened in the same area/location. my friend and i were sitting in my mother's back yard around 2am, catching up on life after high school. there was a short moment where we were silent and just starred away in the direction of the distant airport, and then we saw it. there is no good way of describing this object... imagine a shooting star that is about the size of a marble at arms length from your face..Only this over-sized star is leaving an almost fire-like trail, all the while this high speed object is changing into the most brilliant colors of what you would see in a rainbow. you could even see the changing of colors in its closely dissolving fire trail. this phenomenon was from one side of the horizon to another within seconds before it obstructed by a tree. we both stand to our feet, cursing and yelling the same question at each other. i have always considered myself a very logical person and anyone, had they seen this, would instantly know that it was otherworldly in some way and not to be explained by science as we know it. since then, i spent much more time at the same location, and it has proven such a "hot-spot". my interest with each experience grows, as does the amount of unanswered questions. in some instances, we included another friend to partake in star-gazing and have seen many with him as well.

i would challenge any skeptic at any stake with this location. if no one has seen anything within one to three nights, then i accept whatever title of craziness is given to me.

will someone please look into this??
content.summary: Over ten sighting within the past few months in the same hot-spot

content.detailedDescription:
1970 over lake washington.  i was 10, and we had just finished playing the games you play at slumber parties such as levitation.  we were all looking out over lake washington and watched a light about the size of a star.  we could tell the light was getting closer to the window as it got larger.  it then retreated, zig zagged across the sky at a high rate of speed then disappeared.  never told anyone about this.  i'd be interested to know if there were any other reports in this area around this time.
thanks for your time,
tamara

p.S.
i don't want my info released at this time, but mufon is welcome to contact me.  just keep in mind the time difference from where you are to guam.  thanks again
content.summary: Came toward the window we were looking out, zipped back and forth then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were at the neighbors in the back yard sitting by a fire pit. the four of us and their daughter were just enjoying the nice night. my wife said " what is that light? " there was a red/amber fuzzy looking light that had come into view over the roof of the house that appeared to be over the city of murfreesboro about 8 miles away.The light was coming from the northeast heading southwest fairly slow. when it got over murfreesboro, it stopped and moved kinda up and down then right and left and started moving back northeast from which it came only started slowly then got smaller and zipped out of sight very fast . there is no way a plane could move out of sight that fast. there is an airport about 20 mi. up the interstate and we see planes all the time at night. at first i being a skeptic about things told my wife it was just a plane but the more i looked at it , i knew it wasn't a plane and my neighbor said it before i could. he is x military and said rob thats not a plane and we all watched it for the entire time until it zoomed out of sight. we all sat around in amazement trying to figure it out. i tried to get on line to see if anyone else had seen this light over murfreesboro but don't really know where to look. if you find out or have anymore questions  call me or email me please that was the strangest thing that i have ever witnessed in the air and i have seen meteor showers and satellites being in the gulf and the woods being a hunter and fisherman.

                              thanks  rob
content.summary: Rose above the roof of neighbors house coming from the northeast heading southwest  stopped zig zagged then went back northeast got smaller and vanished extremely fast.

content.detailedDescription:
in mid-november 10pm of 1964, i was asked by my mother to take out the garbage.  i went out back and i noticed a bright white full moon above.  i look closer and i noticed it had uniform whiteness so i could not see the shade of white or grey that made the "man in the moon" face.  it was equally as bright as the normal full moon, bright enough to create a moon shadow.  i looked around and i noticed another moon bright orange rising over my neighbor's house to the east across the street as i looked from the backyard thru the side yard to the front. it had the features that created the man on the moon so i felt it was the real moon.  i looked above again and stared at the white full moon for a few minutes the it made a rapid ascent in the sky.  as it rose it became smaller until it appeared to look like a bright star, then dim star, then disappeared into space.  it reminded me of the star of bethleham when it was at high altitude.

i was only seven when i witness the ufo i call the moon of memphis.  i had a good memory of the event so when i grew up and joined the air force as a navigator, i was able to analyze the event better with my aviation experience.  i estimated that the moon of memphis was at twenty thousand feet and was about ten acres in size.  i developed this information from watching the ascent of the moon of memphis and remembering that it also passed through some high cirrus clouds that i estimated was at sixty thousand feet.  at twenty thousand feet it would have taken four 747 aircrafts parked in a circle to cover the area of the moon of memphis ufo thus creating a ten acre size estimate.  when i saw it above me it was exactly the size of the real full moon when seen high in the sky.

[cms/tg/pid]
capt usaf / lt uscg retired
content.summary: Full moon in appearance rose up to be bright star then disappeared in sky

content.detailedDescription: The ufo hovered above the home depot and was about 100ft above it and soon flipped upside down and went east towards our airport it landed around 150ft from the airport we were is our car and we followed it because we were going that way and we couldent see it anymore after it landed.I thought it was kind of scary because i was about 200ft away from it when it landed. i thought it was a helicopter until it flipped upside down. i lost sight of it because it landed
content.summary: Had three lights looked like nothing but lights

content.detailedDescription: I was driving with my brother home after dinner on butterfield rd. when i saw this red maroon thing flying about 200ft off the ground.When we drove under it i could see a light or a flame on the bottom(it was cloudy with no sun out so it couldnt be a reflection).The object was about 5-10ft square making no noise traveling east to west. im a aircraft buff and never seen anything like it, kind of scarry.
content.summary: Maroon cube with a light or flame on the bottom.
